ahanna epa tharu paha monawada kiyala.nathnam kalu ahasa gana nil ahasa gana didulana tharu gana mokada ee kisi deka therumak na..na eka aadaraniya therumak thiyanawa.kalayakin nawatha blog ekata liyanna gaththe maha musala okthombaarayak nisa wenna athi mase aarambhaye idala dawas 9k gewila giyath.eliwana thura nidi marana, pukata eliya watena kam nidaganna ,jiwithayawal godakwela.eeka nikamma nikan sadharanikaranaya karaganna uthsaha karana boruwak.meka liyanne awurudu bara gananak parana moratuwa wishwa widyalaye klifad perera nathnam ee hostal eke idan.wishwa widyalaye athule pihitala thiyana ekama pirimi newasikagaraya meka.me lap eka thiyan inna rum eke mese uda ki denek thamange upadhi kiyana jiwithaya wenuwen satan karanna athida me laptop owunta nothibenna athi me mesa uda rakka uda kiyawanna poth thiyenna athi nathanm bidi sigarat arakku adum kunu duwili kolakali nathnam mokuthma nothibenna athi.me kamara wala owun wiplawa karanna athi sanwada karanna athi kunu katha kiyanna athi aadaraya gana lokaya gana hithanna athi.nathnam mokuthama nokara nida ganna athi.

athe a`gili ganatath wada adu awanhal himiyan kihipa deneku wisin karana mema jawarama nisa hikkaduwe sancharaka karmanthayata kalu pallamak ek wi athi bawa pawasanne nithyanukulawa sancharaka karmanthaye niratha wuwanya.

aththatama ee denna wishayak hatiyata gaththama lankawe dawanthayo denna.
putha menma duwa gayanayatada dakshayanya.
ibagathe aa kumarayata nam sampradayika kumara rupayak ehen mehen gawila thibuna.
anathurin thuwala labu ema sisuwa balangoda mulika rohalata athulath kara athi athara pasuwa ohu kolambaa jathika rohalata maru kara yawa thibenawa.
beli dans kiwwama kawuruth dannawane menna mama ahamben dakka saksima beli dans ekak.
agana prathishtawa giwisumakadi deparshawayak athara athiwana anyonya thawaya hewath
nosithu lesa nandungamuwe saddanthaya anathurakata muhuna di thibeyi.
samarawira mahatha ejapaya niyojanaya kala da ohuge urumaya thibenne shri lanipaye wimath jathyantharaya piligath libaral prajathanathrawadiyaku wimath eeta hethuwe thibe.
pandithayo ebas asa laksha na danmehi samarththasa bawin ohuge lakunu bala ‘asathpurushawu thada parushawu kelehi guna nodanna wishamadhyausha athi ekeka.
